price: Do not walk on the earth arrogantly; you cannot cleave the earth, nor can you reach the mountains in height[35].
arabic: وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّكَ لَن تَخۡرِقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَن تَبۡلُغَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ طُولٗا
footnotes: [35] Man is indeed a weak and small creature, then why arrogance?!

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: walā tamshi fī al-arḍi maraḥan innaka lan takhriqa al-arḍa walan tablugha al-jibāla ṭūlan
